title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 431 - Care and Protection of Children
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 431 - Care and Protection of Children

State Regulations
§ 431.3 - [Repealed]
§ 431.4 - Retention of earnings of children in foster care
§ 431.5 - Staffing standards for administration of child welfare services and care by social services departments
§ 431.6 - Court ordered placement of children
§ 431.7 - Standards for access to and disclosure of confidential HIV-related information
§ 431.8 - Procedures in cases of children absent without consent from foster care placement
§ 431.9 - Termination of parental rights by local social services agency
§ 431.10 - Placement in foster family care of children who are siblings
§ 431.11 - Rights of parents or guardians
§ 431.12 - Renumbered
§ 431.13 - Summer camps to be used by commissioners of social services
§ 431.14 - Termination or limitation of visitation rights by authorized agency
§ 431.15 - Information to families
§ 431.16 - Renumbered
§ 431.17 - Care and custody of children placed in facilities operated or supervised by the Office of Mental Health or the Office of Mental Retardation and Developmental facilities
§ 431.18 - Care and protection of Indian children
§ 431.19 - Conditional release of youth placed pursuant to a delinquency adjudication
§ 431.20 - Interruption of placement time
§ 431.21 - Placement calculation for youth placed pursuant to a delinquency adjudication

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 431

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 131, 358-a, 372-b, 373-a, 374, 378-a, 383-c, 384, 384-a, 384-b, 392, 398, 398-a, 398-b, 409-e, 409-f, 450, 453, 462; Family Court Act, art. 10-A, § 1017; L. 1971, ch. 110, § 83; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 1999, ch. 7, §
58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
